attributes.action: Stop the RMT holding this city to ransom with its strike actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are fed up and infuriated with the RMT holding the city to ransom every time they have a dispute with TFL - then sign here !

Its about time this government and the Mayor of London allied to take tough action against TFL and especially the RMT using fines, or legislation or whatever it takes to stop these wildcat strikes.

If the RMT can afford a wildcat strike at our expense, then they should afford a fine or penalty against their members at their expense for loss of service - perhaps then they will consider more carefully how their actions affect and disrupt this city and its peoples!
